page.title: 13Recreation in Banchory
page.content: According to the people we interviewed,Banchory's facilities for leisure and recreation were satisfactory, although several people felt that a public swimming pool and a leisure centre were needed to cater for the needs of the growing community,and especially for the young people in the area. The families interviewed all felt that Banchory is an attractive place to live in and most expressed the hope that it shouldn't grow much bigger. They seemed to be very satisfied with the quality of life in Banchory.
